text: (nirākarikkum) ivarkaḷ pūmiyil cuṟṟit tirintu pārkkavillaiyā? Appōtu, avarkaḷukku muṉṉiruntavarkaḷiṉ muṭivu evvāṟāyiṟṟu eṉpataik kaṇṭukoḷvārkaḷ. Avarkaḷ, ivarkaḷai viṭa makkaḷ tokaiyil atikamāṉavarkaḷākavum palattālum, pūmiyil viṭṭuc ceṉṟa (pūrva) ciṉṉaṅkaḷālum mikaittavarkaḷākavum iruntārkaḷ. Eṉiṉum, avarkaḷ tēṭi cēkarittu vaittiruntavaṟṟil oṉṟumē avarkaḷukkup payaṉaḷikkavillai
